requirements.plaintext: Complete Gendou Ringo's Strange Fortune Slips and Omnipresence Over Mortals

steps.plaintext: Head for the safehouse to investigate
steps.markdown: Head for the safehouse to investigate

steps.plaintext: Go to the safehouse to look for Gendou Ringo
steps.markdown: Go to the safehouse to look for ◀Gendou Ringo▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Gendou_Ringo▷

substeps.plaintext: Win the trust of the spy in Ritou
substeps.markdown: Win the trust of the spy in Ritou

substeps.plaintext: Win the trust of the spy in Inazuma City
substeps.markdown: Win the trust of the spy in Inazuma City

substeps.plaintext: Win the trust of the spy at the hot springs
substeps.markdown: Win the trust of the spy at the hot springs

substeps.plaintext: (Optional) Talk to Mikawa Akane to pinpoint her location
